alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 8:22PM MDT until May 16 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Cheyenne River near Plainview affecting Haakon and Ziebach Counties. For the Cheyenne River...including Plainview...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cheyenne River near Plainview. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural land along the Cheyenne River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:46 PM MDT Sunday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 18.2 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 930 AM MDT.
